title: Basic Civil Engineering
description: Reading books is a kind of enjoyment. Reading books is a good habit. We bring you a different kinds of books.

title: The Tower And Bridge
description: its first paperback edition, all are striking examples of structural art, an exciting form distinct from either architecture or machine design.

title: Surveying & Levelling
description: Written in a user-friendly manner, this book presents the basic principles of surveying and levelling in a simple and systematic manner.

title: Civil Engineering Capsule
description: This book helps u to crack competitive exams and it contains all the questions with its solution.

title: HandBook On Civil Engineering
description: Provides well illustrated formulae and key theory concepts which are used for cracking exams with questions and its solutions.
